title: I got diamond.
body:
With more losses than wins, mained support and practically only played it [no duo], and with an HP laptop which isn't bad but apparently laptops are cancer.

I was plat II last season and plat II in season 4, I finally buckled the fuck down and accepted that I was to main support.

Don't be afraid of maining anything in this game, if you're good at it you will be good in the match. 

Also love you guys, without GD I probably would be in deep depression and consider Ufu'ing myself often, god bless.

:^)
